reviews.review_text: The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the referral system and saw 50% revenue increase in 2 months. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied goal-setting framework with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 73% in 2 months. Worth every penny.

Loved the practice sessions. Being able to discuss marketing authentically with peers who 'get it' was invaluable. The template library is something I still reference all the time. Great ongoing value.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The goal-setting framework was excellent, but tech implementation could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 7 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

I've taken 9 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on outcome measurement helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 90 days I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.

Finally, a certification that respects your intelligence. The research foundation section gave me the conceptual foundation I was missing from my master's program. Now I can confidently explain trauma-informed practice to clients and colleagues.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the marketing scripts templates alone saved me 19 hours of work. Closed 7 new clients in 6 weeks using the pitch framework from Module 3. Already made back 3x my investment.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the value ladder and saw 118% revenue increase in 3 months. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The real-world examples made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied goal-setting framework with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 142% in 2 months. Worth every penny.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The ethical boundaries module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 3 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

The depth of research behind this curriculum is impressive. Every claim backed by peer-reviewed studies, which builds massive credibility with clients. The outcome assessment has become my go-to for intake sessions. Thoroughly evidence-based.

I've taken 9 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on ethical practice helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 3 months I had doubled my rates. The community support was incredible too.

The video demonstrations made all the difference. I learn best by visual aids, and the course accommodated that perfectly. The video demonstrations helped me finally understand trauma-informed approach.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the value ladder and saw 42% revenue increase in 6 weeks. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the marketing scripts templates alone saved me 39 hours of work. Closed 10 new clients in 3 months using the pitch framework from Module 5. Already made back 2x my investment.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The clear explanations made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied goal-setting framework with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 145% in 6 weeks. Worth every penny.

As someone with a background in education, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of person-centered and narrative therapy approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the value ladder and saw 125% revenue increase in 6 weeks. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 6 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The session planner was excellent, but advanced techniques could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.

The depth of research behind this curriculum is impressive. Every claim backed by evidence-based practices, which builds massive credibility with clients. The intake protocol has become my go-to for intake sessions. Thoroughly evidence-based.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the consultation funnel and saw 63% revenue increase in 6 weeks. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The advanced protocols module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 4 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 2 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the client journey map from Module 5. Now charging $179 per session vs $92 before. Game changer.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 6 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Solid content overall, but I wish there was more on group coaching. The Module 3 module felt rushed compared to others. Still valuable, just expected more depth given the price point. Would recommend, but set expectations accordingly.
